String.Target: 从 WIM 文件挂载或者释放一个映像
String.Link: Mount a WIM File or apply an image

String.Target: 卸载安装的 WIM 映像
String.Link: Unmount the WIM Image which mounted

String.Target: 保存对安装的 WIM 映像的更改
String.Link: Saves changes to a mounted WIM image.

String.Target: 保存更改到另一个WIM文件中
String.Link: Save changes to another WIM Image

String.Target: 打开并编辑现有的WIM文件
String.Link: Open and Edit the existing WIM File

String.Target: 将ESD文件（支持加密）转换为ISO。
String.Link: Convert ESD to ISO (Include support for encrypted esd).

String.Target: 解密微软在线提供ESD文件
String.Link: Decrypt ESD Files from Microsoft Online
Restart to WinRE and run Dism++ for me

String.Target: 在官方网站可以获取帮助文档，并提出你的宝贵意见
String.Link: You can get the help documentation and even upload your valueable opinion

String.Target: 只添加指定文件夹路径到映像列表。
String.Link: Add the specified path to the list of images only.

String.Target: 取消所有Compact压缩的文件（存在兼容性问题时使用）
String.Link: Cancel all the compressed files of compact(use it because of a compatibility issue)

String.Target: 将现有的系统备份为WIM或者ESD（如果文件存在则自动增量到原有文件）。
String.Link: Backup the existing system as WIM or ESD (if the file exists then AutoIncrement to the original file).

String.Target: 扫描映像是否存在组件存储损坏
修复映像中存在的组件存储损坏
从现有映像文件（WIM、ESD）恢复系统。
String.Link: Restore OS from an exist image file(WIM,ESD)

String.Target: 你需要增量保存还是直接保存？
String.Link: Save directly or perform an imcremental save?

String.Target: 温馨提示：保存映像后空间不会减少，如果需要减少空间请重新编译目标文件。
String.Link: Tips: The space will not reduce after saving the image, please recompile target file to reduce the space for the target file

String.Target: 增量保存（推荐） 创建一个新的映像，不会覆盖原有数据。
String.Link: Incremental save (recommended) Creat a new image,will not replace the original data.

String.Target: 直接保存 将覆盖当前映像的数据。
String.Link: Direct save It will replace the current image data.

String.Target: 此位置的系统已经存在当前系统已经存在，需要使用系统还原么？
String.Link: This position already has a system.Do you need to use system restore?

String.Target: 此位置的系统已经存在当前系统已经存在。
String.Link: This position already has a system.

String.Target: %s 位置的映像正在进行其他事情，请稍后再试。
String.Link: The image of %s position are working on other things, please try again later.

String.Target: 正在进行第 %d 阶段（共 %d ）
此功能可以将微软发布的ESD转换为ISO，还支持加密的ESD哦。
String.Link: This function can convert ESD to ISO, also support for encrypted ESD.

String.Target: 无法获取RE信息，错误代码：%d
String.Link: Can't get the WinRE info, error code: %d

String.Target: 重启后，系统自动将启动RE，你确定要重启么？
String.Link: System will restart to WinRE,do you want to restart now?

String.Target: 此功能可以将ESD、WIM格式相互转换。
String.Link: This function can convert ESD to WIM & convert WIM to ESD

String.Target: Dism++将会在RE中启动，你现在需要重启电脑么？
String.Link: Dism++ will start in WinRE, do you want to restart now?

String.Target: %s 位置的映像正繁忙，请稍后再试。
String.Link: The location of %s image is busy, please try again later.

String.Target: Sorry，无法配置环境，请在PE中使用此功能。
String.Link: Sorry,I'm not able to configure the environment, please try it in WinPE.
Sorry,I'm not able to clean the temporary data

String.Target: 当前硬盘可用空间不足，你需要重启并进入RE进行恢复么？
String.Link: The current hard disk do not have enough space,do you want to restore in winRE?

String.Target: 在还原前你需要格式化分区：%s ?
String.Link: Do you want to format the partition %s before you restore?

String.Target: 温馨提示：格式化分区该分区所有数据将丢失！
String.Link: Warning: Data will be lost after you formatting it!

String.Target: 格式化分区（推荐） 有助于系统分区整洁，消除文件残留。
String.Link: Format(Recommand) Help system partition to be tidy,delete the residual files.

String.Target: 你需要重启并立即生效么？
String.Link: Do you want to restart to take effect immediately?

String.Target: Dism++正在执行任务，你确定要关闭程序么？
String.Link: Dism ++ is working,do you want to close dism++?

String.Target: 正在扫描已安装的系统

String.Link: Please enter the path of the image

String.Target: 请在此输入安装路径，比如C:\
String.Link: Please enter the installation path of the image here.For example,C:\

String.Target: 请在此输入挂载路径，比如D:\1
String.Link: Please enter the mounting path here.For example,D:\1

String.Target: 即将完成操作，请选择其中一个映像。
String.Link: The operation will finish, please select an image.

String.Target: 此功能可以将其他文件（WIM、ESD、VHD、VHDX）或者文件夹的包含的映像添加至映像列表。
String.Link: This function can add other files(WIM,ESD,VHD,VHDX) or the image in the folder to the list of the image.

String.Target: 挂载映像文件（WIM、VHD、VHDX）中的映像到指定目录
String.Link: Mount the image files (WIM, VHD, VHDX) to the specified directory

String.Target: 释放映像文件（WIM、ESD）中的映像到指定目录
String.Link: Apply the image files (WIM, VHD) to the specified directory

String.Target: 谢谢，我只需要添加指定文件夹路径到映像列表
String.Link: Thanks, I just need to add the specified path to the list of images

String.Target: 请在此输入映像文件路径，比如 D:\Backup.wim
String.Link: Please enter the path to the image file.For example,D:\Backup.wim

String.Target: 你可以在此处修改映像文件信息（支持双击修改）
String.Link: You can edit image file information here(double click to edit)

String.Target: 在此处设置捕获映像的文件豁免列表加快捕获速度，每个条目用回车分割。
String.Link: Set exclude list for capture image here,each item segmented by enter.
How to config the exclude list

String.Target: 映像十分健康不需要修复。
String.Link: The image is intact.It do not need repair.

String.Target: 映像已经受损，但是可以修复。
String.Link: The image has been damaged,you can repair it.

String.Target: 映像已经受到致命问题，已经无法修复，请修复安装。
String.Link: The image has a fatal wound,I'm not able to repair, please repair your installation.

String.Target: 恭喜映像已经修复成功！

String.Link: Fatal error, the session is not response.

String.Target: 本地源可以大幅度加速功能打开以及系统修复。
String.Link: Local Source can accelerate to enable features and system repair.

String.Target: 请在此输入源文件路径
String.Link: Please enter the path of the source file here

String.Target: 请在此输入目标文件路径
String.Link: Please enter the path of the destination file here

String.Target: 温馨提示：此功能将直接解密目标文件，原版控请自行备份。
String.Link: Tips: this function will decrypt the target file,directly.Please backup the original files.
The decryption password has been matched automaticly

String.Target: 请在输入框输入解密口令
String.Link: Please input the decryption password into the input box
Please enter the correct Key, error: %s

String.Target: 该文件似乎不是一个有效的WIM、ESD文件。
String.Link: This file seems is not a valid WIM or ESD files.

String.Target: 该文件没有被加密，无需解密。
String.Link: The file is not encrypted, do not need to decrypt.

String.Target: 温馨提示：双击可修改映像信息对应的值。
String.Link: Tips: you can modify values by double click

String.Target: 正在添加映像，请耐心等待……
此映像并不在分区根目录，所以无法执行修复操作。
String.Link: Unable to repair bacuse this image is not at the root of partition.

String.Target: 当前映像正在运行，所以无法执行修复操作。
String.Link: Unable to repair because the image is being used.

String.Target: 恭喜已经成功修复引导。
启动修复失败，错误代码：%d
你必须点击更多进行手动指定！
String.Link: You have to click "more" to specify it manually!

String.Target: 即将把启动信息写入启动分区- %s
String.Link: The boot record will be written in the boot partition - %s

String.Target: 没有异议或者看不懂的请点击 %s 。
String.Link: If you don't have objection or you be blind to it(them),please click on %s.

String.Target: 无法获取该分区的详细信息。
String.Link: Unable to get detailed information about the partition.

String.Target: 目标系统需要以UEFI方式启动，请选择一个GPT分区。
String.Link: Target system needs to boot with UEFI, you need to select a GPT partition.
If you boot with UEFI,it needs (a) FAT16/FAT32 partition(s)

String.Target: 目标系统需要以BIOS方式启动，请选择一个MBR分区。
String.Link: Target system needs to boot with BIOS, please select an MBR partition.

String.Target: BIOS启动分区必须是个主分区。
String.Link: BIOS boot partition must be a primary partition.
Accelerate the speed of enabled feature

String.Target: 减少映像文件（WIM、ESD）保存时间
String.Link: Reduce the save duration of image file (WIM, and ESD)

String.Target: 压缩率越小性能越好（仅影响选中系统）
String.Link: the smaller Compression ratio,the better performance(the selected system only)

String.Target: Dism++正在执行其他任务，你可以稍后打开会话。
String.Link: Dism++ is doing other tasks, you can open session later.

String.Target: 为了优化性能，你需要手动打开会话。
String.Link: To optimize performance, you need to open the session manually.

String.Target: 本次共释放了%s 的空间。

软件Q群：200783396、282276394（敲门砖：临安初雨 一夜落红） 官方网站：www.chuyu.me
如果发现BUG或者意见可以通过邮箱（mingkuang@live.com）或者在QQ群联系我
诚请五湖四海的朋友为Dism++国际化支持添砖加瓦！ ——感谢以下是热心用户背后默默的付出，排名仅根据首字母，不分重次先后——
String.Link:
official site: www.chuyu.me
If you find BUG or have opinion(s) you can contact me via e-mail (mingkuang@live.com)
Invite the friends around the world to contributing to Dism ++ multi-language support! ——Thank the Sincere Enthusiastic users,I according to the first letter to rank them,not according to the importance.——

String.Target: 该规则来自CCleaner解析引擎，因此不能提供说明。
String.Link: The rule is from the CCleaner rules, so Dism++ unable to show description(s).

String.Target: 关于 %s 的详细处理信息
以下文件即将被处理，你可以点击 清理 处理他们
String.Link: The following files will be processed, and you can click‘Clean Up’to process them

String.Target:
关于 %s 的警告：
%s
您确定要清理么？
String.Link:
%s warning:
%s
Are you sure you want to continue?

String.Target: 温馨提示：删除关键驱动可能导致计算机无法启动
String.Link: Tips: delete the important driver may lead your computer to cannot start
Please select the path to save the driver(s).

String.Target: 一个或者多个驱动删除失败，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: One or several drivers failed to delete,error code: 0x%.8X

String.Target: 请选择驱动所在文件夹
String.Link: Please select the folder of driver

String.Target: 一个或者多个驱动添加失败，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: One or several drivers failed to add,error code: 0x%.8X

String.Target: 系统启动项（仅启动一次） —— HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce
系统启动项32位（仅启动一次） —— HKLM\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce
用户启动项（仅启动一次） —— HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce
…> _ <… 一个或者多个功能应用失败，%s
String.Link: …> _ <… One or several features failed to apply, %s

String.Target: 温馨提示：在详细设置中配置本地源可大幅度减少功能启用时间
String.Link: Tips: Configure detailed settings can Obviously reduce the enabled-time of local sources

String.Target: 正在删除第 %d 个更新（共 %d ）
正在安装第 %d 个更新（共 %d ）
正在删除第 %d 个可选功能（共 %d ）
删除Windows Store可能导致你未来无法下载或更新Appx，你确定要继续么？
String.Link: Delete the Windows Store may lead windows cannot download or update Appx, are you sure you want to continue?

String.Target: %s 等待超时，请尝试使用空间回收 - 过期Appx清理。
String.Link: %s timeout, try to use Clean up - to clean up Outdated Appx application.

String.Target: %s 无法获取Appx关联的账号信息，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: %s can't get the information of Appx account.Error code: 0x%.8X

String.Target: %s 无法获取账号SID，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: %s Unable to get the account SID, error code: 0x%.8X

String.Target: %s 所关联的用户（%s）无法删除，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: %s associated user (%s) cannot be deleted, error code: 0x%.8X
%s is not associated with any user.

String.Target: 一个或者多个更新安装失败，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: One or several update installation failed.Error code: 0x%.8X.

String.Target: 帮助用户备份已激活系统信息，方便下次还原。
String.Link: Back up the activated system to restore after you reinstalling the system.

String.Target: 这里可以写备份说明，支持Windows以及Office零售版 : )
String.Link: Annotate for the backup.Supported to windows & office retail : )

String.Target: sppsvc关闭失败，有可能导致还原失败，是否继续？
String.Link: Sppsvc closes failed. Perhaps the program will restore failed.Continue or not?

String.Target:
当前系统为 %hd.%hd %s，而激活备份信息为 %hd.%hd %s
信息不匹配，你确定要继续么？
String.Link:
Current system is %hd.%hd %s but the backed-up activation is %hd.%hd %s
They don't match.Continue or not?

String.Target: 请重新选择你的系统，你当前要还原的系统与本系统不匹配，请重新选择你的系统！
String.Link: That system(to restore this system)doesn't match with this system. Please re-select your system!

String.Target: 备份的信息与你所还原的信息版本不同，是否要继续还原？
String.Link: The backed-up information and that information(which you restore)are different. Continue restoring or not?

String.Target: Sorry暂不支持此系统，请反馈给我。
String.Link: Sorry. I'm not supported to this system,please send me a feedback.

String.Target: 还原失败！具体错误信息请参考Dism++.log。
String.Link: Restore failed. Please look at Dism++.log file.

String.Target: 用于清空登录密码或者启用其他登录账号。
String.Link: To delete the password or enable other accounts.

String.Target: 该账户的密码已经被清空，现在无需密码即可登陆你的账号！
String.Link: The password is deleted. You can log in without password.

String.Target: 让其他程序以无视权限方式运行。
String.Link: Run some programs bypass rights checking.

String.Target: 请在此输入命令或者程序路径，比如regedit
String.Link: Please input the command or program path such as regedit

String.Target: 本工具可以让其他程序以无视权限形式运行，本功能可以通过命令行参数调用，详情请参考帮助文档了解具体用法。
String.Link: This tool can run some programs bypass rights checking. You can invoke this function with command line. Please look at the document.

String.Target:
/GodMode {Commendline} 春哥附体执行Cmd命令，其命令格式与Cmd用法一致
示例: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode cmd Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode regedit.exe Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode "\"C:\Windows\notepad.exe\" \"C:\123.txt\""
String.Link:
/GodMode {Commandline} God mode uses cmd. The usage is the same as cmd usage.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode cmd Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode regedit.exe Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode "\"C:\Windows\notepad.exe\" \"C:\123.txt\""

String.Target:
即将以无视权限方式执行此命令： %s
为了避免让恶意软件利用，Dism++需要你的允许才能继续，你确定要继续吗？
String.Link:
Dism++ will run the commands %s
bypass the rights checking. To prevent malwares use,please allow dism++. Continue or not?

String.Target:
可以使用以下命令来操作此映：
/GodMode - 使用春哥附体启动应用程序
String.Link:
You can use these commands to operate the image:
/GodMode - run programs with God mode

String.Target: 用于修改WIM、SWM以及ESD文件信息。
提供简单的文件浏览，并支持无视权限删除。
String.Link: It can explore some files simply. It can bypass rights checking.

String.Target: 仅针对当前用户，选项为灰色时无法调整设置。
String.Link: Only for the current user, unable to adjust the settings when the color of the option is gray.

String.Target: 针对系统或者默认用户配置。
String.Link: The configuration is only for the system or the default user.

String.Target: 导入注册表文件过程中遇到问题，具体错误信息请参考 Dism++.log。
String.Link: Import Registry File experiencing trouble, please refer to the specific error message Dism++.log.
Choose how to display the Cortana on taskbar

String.Target: *将用户账号控制程序（UAC）调整为
String.Link: *Choose when to be notified about changes to your computer (User Account Control Settings)

String.Target: 此选项将导致计算机面临安全风险！
String.Link: This item will make the computer into security risk!

String.Target: 打开资源管理器时显示此电脑
String.Link: Open File Explorer to This PC
Show extensions for all file types

String.Target: 隐藏可执行文件小盾牌
创建快捷方式时不添"快捷方式"文字（此条目由 518516.net提供）
String.Link: Prevent adding "Shortcut" text when you create a shortcut (by 518516.net)

String.Target: 隐藏此电脑中视频、图片、文档、下载、音乐、桌面六个文件夹
String.Link: Hide the Videos, Pictures, Documents, Downloads, Music, Desktop Folders in This PC

String.Target: *隐藏桌面右下角教育版水印
收起资源管理器功能区（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
显示开始菜单、任务栏、操作中心和标题栏的颜色（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
String.Link: Show color on Start Menu, Taskbar, Action Center, and Title bar (by Rambin)

String.Target: 禁止自动播放（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
在单独的进程中打开文件夹窗口（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Launch folder windows in a separate process (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 始终显示菜单栏（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Always show the menu bar (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 资源管理器窗口最小化时显示完整路径（此条目由 原罪 提供）
String.Link: Show the complete path if windows explorer is minimized (by YZ)

String.Target: 使开始菜单、任务栏、操作中心透明
String.Link: Make Start Menu, Taskbar, and Action Center transparent

String.Target: 使任务栏更透明（此条目由 518516.net 提供）
偶尔在开始菜单中显示建议
String.Link: Occasionally show suggestions in Start Menu

String.Target: 关闭多个选项卡时不发出警告（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Don't warn me when closing multiple tabs (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 当创建新选项卡时，始终切换到新选项卡（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Always switch to new tabs when they are created (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 其他程序从当前窗口的新选项卡打开连接（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Open links from other programs in a new tab in the current window (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 以兼容性视图中显示所有网站（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Display all websites in Compatibility view (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 启用表单的自动完成功能（此条目由 原罪 提供）
关闭建议的网站（此条目由 原罪 提供）
跳过IE首次运行自定义设置（此条目由 原罪 提供）
String.Link: Prevent running First Run wizard (by YZ)

String.Target: 微软拼音默认为英语输入（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
String.Link: Make IME default mode English (by Rambin)

String.Target: 关闭微软拼音云计算（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
自动安装无需重启的更新（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
String.Link: Allow Automatic Updates immediate installation (by Rambin)

String.Target: 更新挂起时如果有用户登录不自动重启计算机（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
String.Link: No auto-restart when logged on users for scheduled automatic updates installations (by Rambin)

String.Target: 启用自动换行（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
始终显示状态栏（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
*关闭默认共享（此条目由 518516.net 提供）
*关闭防火墙（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
此选项将降低计算机安全性，请确保你已经安装第三方防火墙软件！
String.Link: This item will reduce the computer security. Please make sure you have the third-party firewall!

String.Target: *关闭远程协助（此条目由 原罪 提供）
禁用程序兼容性助手（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Disable Program Compatibility Assistant Service (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 禁用远程修改注册表（此条目由 一叶微风TM 提供）
String.Link: Disable Remote Registry Service (by YiYieWeiFeng TM)

String.Target: 禁用此服务将导致IPv6无法正常使用，请确保你不需要使用IPv6！
String.Link: Disable the service makes IPv6 cannot normal work. Please make sure you won't use IPv6!

String.Target: 禁用此服务将导致搜索文件变慢，并且某些Windows Store可能无法正常使用！
String.Link: Disable the service, will be slower when you search files. And some Windows Store Apps may be not run properly!

String.Target: 锁定WinRAR工具栏（此条目由 原罪 提供）
隐藏WinRAR 在右键菜单中添加的"压缩并 E-mail..."（此条目由 原罪 提供）
String.Link: Hide "Compression and E-mail..." context menu which added by WinRAR (by YZ)

String.Target: 不显示首次使用对话框（此条目由 原罪 提供）
String.Link: Prevent running First Run wizard (by YZ)

String.Target: 关闭OneDrive（此条目由 Rambin 提供）
*VHD启动时不要将VHD动态文件扩展到最大（以节省空间）
String.Link: *Prevent expanded file size to the maximum when booting by dynamic VHD file (To save space)

String.Target: 此选项可能降低VHD文件性能。
String.Link: This option may reduce the VHD file performance.

String.Target: *隐藏某些SATA硬盘任务栏图标（此条目由 原罪 提供）
String.Link: *Hide taskbar icon of some SATA hard disks (by YZ)

String.Target: 蓝屏时自动重启（此条目由 原罪 提供）
你需要使用新手模式还是专家模式？
String.Link: To use novice mode or expert mode?

String.Target: 温馨提示：可以在菜单中点击设置，随时取消新手模式。
String.Link: Tips: You can set in the menu at any time to cancel the novice mode.

String.Target: 新手模式（推荐） 仅显示垃圾清理以及实用小工具。
String.Link: Novice mode(Recommend) Show cleanup tool and gadgets only.

String.Target: 专家模式 支持驱动管理，服务管理等……天朝专家慎用。
String.Link: Expert mode Support driver,service management...Novices do not choose.

String.Target:
发现新版本，需要更新 %d 个文件，约%s。
更新日志：
%s 确定要升级吗？
String.Link:
A new version have been detected. %d files will be updated and it will need %s free space.
Changelog:
%s
Do you want to upgrade?

String.Target: 更新文件过程中遇到错误，Orz……
String.Link: Emerged the error(s) when updating, Orz......

String.Target: Dism++初始化成功，开始执行命令：%s
String.Link: Dism ++ initialization successfully,start to execute the command:%s

String.Target: 未正确识别到命令，以下是程序支持的所有命令：
String.Link: An error occurred while processing the command. Ensure that the command-line arguments are valid. The following commands is supported:

String.Target: 将一个文件夹或者文件进行Compact压缩： /C { /exe [ xpress4k（默认、更佳性能） | xpress8k | xpress16k | lzx（更小体积） ] } Path
String.Link: Compact compress a folder or file(s): /C { /exe [ xpress4k(default,Faster) | xpress8k | xpress16k | lzx(Smaller) ] } Path

String.Target: 将一个文件夹或者文件进行Compact解压缩 /U Path
String.Link: Decompress Compact a folder or file(s) /U Path

String.Target:
/Image:<path_to_image> - 指定特定 Windows 映像的根目录的路径。
示例： Dism++x86.exe /Image:C:\ /? Dism++x86.exe /Image:"D:\1213\" /?
String.Link:
/Image:<path_to_image> - The path to the root directory of the image.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /Image:C:\ /? Dism++x86.exe /Image:"D:\1213\" /?

String.Target:
映像管理命令： /All - 打开全局会话 /Image - 指定特定 Windows 映像的根目录的路径。
Compact支持命令： /C - 使用Compact压缩文件/文件夹 /U - 撤销Compact压缩的文件/文件夹
若要获得有关这些 Dism++ 选项及其参数的详细信息，请在紧挨着 /? 之前指定一个选项。 示例： Dism++x86.exe /Image /? Dism++x86.exe /C /?
String.Link:
Image Management Command: /All - Open the global session /Image - Designate the root directory of windows image
Compact supported command /C - Use the compressed files/folders(compressed with compact) /U - Revoke the compressed files/folders(compressed with compact)
For more information about these Dism++ options and their arguments, specify an\noption immediately before /?. Examples: Dism++x86.exe /Image /? Dism++x86.exe /C /?

String.Target:
/Plugin:<Plugin_ID> - 此功能用于打开某插件支持的命令
示例： Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /?
String.Link:
/Plugin:<Plugin_ID> - To run the commands supported with a plug-in.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /?

String.Target:
可以使用以下命令来操作此映：
插件命令： /Plugin - 启动特定插件（需要插件支持命令参数）
String.Link: You can use these commands to operate this image: Command: /Plugin - Run the designated plug-in (Need plugin support)

String.Target: (ˉ▽ˉ；)...程序运行时不小心崩溃了，您可以通过邮箱（mingkuang@live.com）报告此问题。
String.Link: (ˉ▽ˉ；)... Sorry, Dism++ have been crashed, you can report the problem via e-mail (mingkuang@live.com).

String.Target: 当前模式不支持引导修复以及格式化分区，你需要重启并进入RE进行恢复么？
String.Link: Current mode can not use boot repair or format partition. Do you want to restart to WinRE for recovery?

String.Target: 格式化分区 %s 失败，错误代码：%d。
String.Link: Format the partition %s failed, error code:%d.

String.Target: 当前其他任务正在进行，请稍等……
String.Link: Other tasks are running currently, please wait...

String.Target: 清理被取代的组件并减少组件存储的大小。
String.Link: Use it to clean up the superseded components and reduce the size of the component store.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载更新，如果有卸载更新需求请勿使用此选项。
String.Link: The installed Windows Updates cannot be uninstalled after the operation is completed.

String.Target: 删除计算机中不使用的驱动程序以节省驱动存储池空间。
String.Link: Delete unused drivers to save spaces.

String.Target: 该功能对于某些精简系统或者手动处理过驱动的系统可能发生驱动签名问题。
String.Link: Perhaps this function will lead driver signature problem in some simplified systems or manual-processed-driver systems.

String.Target: 使用利用NTFS硬链接特性合并所有文件内容相同的文件。
String.Link: Use NTFS hard link to merge all the same-content-file.

String.Target: 某些文件被硬链接合并后可能导致相关功能无法正常使用。
String.Link: Some files merged will not work normally properly.

String.Target: 对单纯读取的文件进行哈夫曼压缩，在不影响性能的情况下，显著减少系统体积。特别感谢矿工以及所有Compact团队成员无私的支持与帮助。
String.Link: Compree the read-only file with Huffman compression,it will not impact the performance,reduce the volume of the system evidently. Special thanks to the miners and the selfless support and aid of the member of compact team.

String.Target: 使用后可能导致某些程序无法正常运行甚至让系统无法启动，如果使用后出现问题，可以在PE中点击 恢复功能-->撤销Compact。
String.Link: After using it,some program will not run normally probably,system cannot start even.You can check 'Never Compact' in WinPE

String.Target: 在Appx应用升级时，会留下老版本应用，该功能将删除那些不使用的老版本。
String.Link: When updating an Appx,it will not delete the older versions.This function can delete the unused older versions(Beta feature, may lead metro app unstartable.)

String.Target: 少数用户报告称使用后无法打开Appx应用，需要重新安装Appx应用。
String.Link: A few users said after use it,Appx cannot run.They need to reinstall Appx.

String.Target: 系统更新时在WinSxS里面产生的临时文件。
String.Link: When system updating,system make the temp files
Windows log files. Thanks chenyu****@gmail.com, YukiSakura.

String.Target: Windows在下载更新以及更新Metro应用时会在这里产生临时安装包。
String.Link: When windows downloading update(s) or updating metro apps,system make temp installation package(s) in here

String.Target: 一些程序为特定用户产生的临时文件。
String.Link: Temp files generated for specific users.

String.Target: 当程序遇到某些问题时，系统会在这里留下稳定性报告，建议你定期清理。
String.Link: When the programs have some problems, the system will left a stability report here,I recommended you clean the stability report annually.

String.Target: 常见的驱动临时解压目录
String.Link: common temp extract directory for drivers

String.Target: Intel、AMD以及Nvidia驱动在安装时留下的解压目录。
String.Link: When Intel , AMD and Nvidia drivers installing,they made the extracted directory.

String.Target: Terminal Server Client运行时产生的一些缓存文件。
String.Link: When Terminal Server Client running,Terminal Server Client made the cache.

String.Target: 在系统升级或者还原后留下的系统备份。
String.Link: When system upgrading or restoring,system made the backup.

String.Target: 删除后你将无法回滚到以前安装的系统。
String.Link: After deleting,you cannot restore to the earlier system.

String.Target: 在系统升级或者还原后留下的系统临时安装文件，如果你确定当前没有进行系统升级或者还原，那么可以安全删除。
String.Link: When system upgrading or restoring,system made the backup.If you ensure you did not upgrade or restore system,you can delete the backup

String.Target: QQ运行时产生的临时文件还有日志，不影响QQ消息记录，建议定期删除。
String.Link: When QQ running,QQ made the temp files and log files.I recommend you delete them regularly

String.Target: YY运行时产生的一些临时文件以及日志，建议定期删除。
String.Link: When YY running,YY made the temp files and log files.I recommend you delete them regularly

String.Target: 使用Installer技术的安装程序产生的缓存。
可能导致卸载Office、VM等应用程序需要安装包。
String.Link: May lead to uninstall Office, VM applications.You need installation package.

String.Target: 安装Visual Studio后产生的安装源，如果不需要卸载VS可以考虑删除。
String.Link: After you installing visual studio,the program（s) made the installation source.If you do not need to uninstall visual studio,you can consider to delete.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载只能升级安装或者强行删除。
String.Link: After cleaning you cannot uninstall.You can only upgrade or force delete.

String.Target: 安装Office后产生的安装源，如果不需要卸载Office可以考虑删除，删除后能正常安装Office更新。
String.Link: After you installing office,the program(s) made the installation source.If you do not need to uninstall office,you can consider to delete.After deleting you can install the upgrade(s) normally.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载只能升级安装或者强行删除，Office 2007以下版本（包含）删除后还影响安装更新。
String.Link: After cleaning,you can only upgrade to newer version or force delete.If you installed office2007 or earlier version,it will impact office install update(s)

String.Target: 腾讯相关软件下载目录
腾讯相关软件更新时会在此留下残留。
String.Link: When Tencent softwares updating,they will leave residue.

String.Target: WP开发时保存的一些虚拟机状态文件
String.Link: When WP developing,WP saved some virtual machine state files.

String.Target: 修改启动信息后系统会创建备份，方便回滚。如果确定不需要还原则可以删除。
String.Link: After you changing the startup information,system creates the backup, easy to change back. If you don't need to change back it,you can delete.

String.Target: 调试程序时创建的符号缓存，如果你不需要这些缓存可以删除。
String.Link: Created when the debugger symbol cache, if you don't need these caches can be deleted.

String.Target: 微软拼音升级程序遗留下的安装文件。
String.Link: Microsoft pinyin IME updater left the installation files.

String.Target: 百度网盘运行时产生的一些日志文件。
String.Link: When Baidu Yun running,it made the log files.

String.Target: 飞信运行时产生的一些日志文件。
String.Link: When Fei Xing running,it made the log files.

String.Target: 用于存放用户手动删除的文件目录。
String.Link: To store the user manually deleted files.
After you installing office365/2016,the program made the installation source

String.Target: 清理可能导致无法正常卸载Office。
String.Link: After cleaning you cannot uninstall office normally probable.

String.Target: 苹果相关设备备份文件，比如通讯录、照片、视频等。
String.Link: The backup of iOS(or MAC).For example,contacts, photos, videos...

String.Target: 请你确保暂时不需要使用恢复功能，如果你现在需要恢复苹果设备，请勿勾选此项目！
String.Link: Please ensure you will not use the recovery function temporary.If you need to restore the iOS(or MAC)device,do not select this item!

String.Target: 硬链接合并功能留下的备份文件。
String.Link: Hardlink merge feature left the backup.

String.Target: 请你确保硬链接合并后系统正常，删除此文件将导致硬链接合并操作无法回滚！
String.Link: Please ensure the system is normal if the hardlink is merged,delete the file will lead the hardlink cannot recovery!

String.Target: Windows在运行过程中产生的事件。
String.Link: When windows running,windows made the events.

String.Target: Dism++为了兼容各个环境，在完整包中存放了大量兼容性文件，以兼容各个平台。此功能可以根据当前环境自动删除不需要的文件。
String.Link: In order to be Compatible with each environment,the developer put lots of compatibility files.This function can delete needless files according to the current environment automatically

String.Target: 魔方守护以及魔方更新暂存目录，如果你不喜欢魔方守护可以考虑删除。
String.Link: The temp directory of PC Master Guard and the update of PC Master.If you don't like PC Master Guard you can delete.

String.Target: 安装蓝手指时留下的给力助手。
String.Link: When you installing bluestacks,the program left GeiLi assistant.

String.Target: 迅雷游戏安装后所在目录，一般人不需要此程序，可以考虑删除。
String.Link: Thunder games directory (after installing), most people do not need this program, you can consider to delete.

String.Target: NET程序运行过程中产生的机器代码缓存文件，不建议频繁清理此条目。此条目由 大胖子技术员 提供。
String.Link: When NET program running,it made the machine code cache files,I do not recommended to clean the cache files frequently.This entry is provided by DaPangZiJiShuYuan.
Residual files of previous version(s) of Dism++

String.Target: 以前版本的Dism++使用的文件。
String.Link: These files used by the previous version(s) of Dism++.
Residual of the version of 360 browser

String.Target: 360浏览器在升级到新版本后留下的老版本文件。
String.Link: After 360 browser updating,the program still save the earlier files.You can select me to delete them
The residues of the version of Ali wangwang

String.Target: 阿里旺旺在升级到新版本后留下的老版本文件。
String.Link: After Ali wangwang updating,the program still save the earlier files.You can select me to delete them
The residues of the version of Ali Pro Amoy

String.Target: 阿里亲淘在升级到新版本后留下的老版本文件。
String.Link: After Ali Pro Amoy updating,the program still save the earlier files.You can select me to delete them

String.Target: 会声会影使用过程中会在此目录产生存档，在不需要后可以删除。
String.Link: Ulead Video Studio save the materials into the archive.If it's needless,you can delete them.

String.Target: 请确保所有编辑的视频已经保存！
String.Link: Please ensure all the edited video has been saved!

String.Target: Visual Studio调试程序时留下的智能跟踪缓存，此条目由LP提供。
String.Link: When visual studio debugging programs,visual studio left the cache of Intelligent Tracking.This function provided by LP

String.Target: 系统以及程序崩溃dmp文件
String.Link: The dmp files of System and Applications

String.Target: 当系统蓝屏或者应用程序崩溃时产生的dmp文件，此条目由 YukiSakura 提供。
String.Link: If computer is blue screen or program which crashed,the computer make dmp files.This function provided by YukiSakura

String.Target: 瑞昱声卡驱动安装源缓存
String.Link: Realtek sound card driver installation source cache

String.Target: 瑞昱声卡安装后留下的安装源缓存，此条目由 YukiSakura 提供。
String.Link: When you installing Realtek sound card,the program left the installation source cache.This function is provided by YukiSakura.

String.Target: 此条目可能影响瑞昱声卡驱动的卸载。
String.Link: After cleaning it,impact you uninstall Realtek sound card driver probably.

String.Target: Java安装后留下的安装源缓存，此条目由 YukiSakura 提供。
String.Link: When you installing Java,the program left the installation source cache.This function is provided by YukiSakura.

String.Target: 此条目可能影响Java的卸载。
String.Link: This entry impact you uninstall java probably.

String.Target: Intel驱动安装后留下的安装源缓存，此条目由 YukiSakura 提供。
String.Link: When you installing Intel driver,the program left the installation source cache.This function is provided by YukiSakura.

String.Target: 此条目可能影响Intel驱动的卸载。
String.Link: This entry impact you uninstall intel driver probably.

String.Target: 英伟达驱动安装源缓存
英伟达驱动安装后留下的安装源缓存，此条目由 YukiSakura 提供。
String.Link: NVIDIA driver install the install source cache left behind, this entry is provided by YukiSakura.

String.Target: 此条目可能影响英伟达驱动的卸载。
String.Link: This entry impact you uninstall NVIDIA driver probably.

String.Target: 用于加速下次程序启动速度，不建议频繁清理此条目。此条目由 辰g. 提供。
String.Link: To accelerate startup-speed of your program at the next time,I do not recommended to use it frequently.This entry is provided by Cheng g.

String.Target: 使用Windows Update安装更新后保存的记录。
String.Link: After updating windows with windows update,windows saved the history.

String.Target: 删除后更新历史记录将被清空。
String.Link: After you deleting it,the update history will be cleared.

String.Target: 安装Microsoft SQL Server补丁残留的安装缓存，此条目由 Honry 提供。
String.Link: If you install microsoft SQL Server,the program leave the install cache.This function is provided by the Honry.

String.Target: 此条目最新添加，可能引发意外问题！
String.Link: This funtion is added at last,may lead to unexpected issue!

String.Target: 安装Adobe Acrobat后留下的安装缓存，此条目由 Honry 提供。
String.Link: After you installing Adobe Acrobat,the program left the installation source cache.This function is provided by the Honry.

String.Target: 删除此条目可能导致Adobe Acrobat无法正常卸载！
String.Link: Select this entry impact you uninstall Adobe Acrobat probably!

String.Target: 小红伞在自动升级过程中残留的临时文件。
String.Link: Avira leaves the temporary files if avira automatic update.
Residual of the version of Chrome browser

String.Target: Chrome浏览器在升级到新版本后留下的老版本文件。（感谢 Honry）
String.Link: When google chrome update to new versions, Chrome didn't delete the earlier files. (By Honry)

String.Target: 安装Microsoft .NET补丁残留的安装缓存，此条目由 撕裂五维空间 提供。
String.Link: When the programs install patches for microsoft .NET, the program leaves some cache. (By SiLieWuWeiKongJian)

MessageTable.x800F0806: One or more updates are pending, please restart and then continue.
MessageTable.xA0010001: Does not support Microsoft's online account password reset, please reset your password through Microsoft's official website.
MessageTable.x4144012B: This is a test message that requires no action. Message code %1.
MessageTable.xC1420100: The specified library is not a valid file system container.
MessageTable.xC1420101: The user attempted to mount an image for read/write access using a container library that is read only.
MessageTable.xC1420103: The user attempted to mount an image to a directory that already exists. This is not supported.
MessageTable.xC1420104: An extract request was received for a file that is not contained within this image. This file will not be extracted.
MessageTable.xC1420105: An extract request was received for a file that does not exist. This condition may occur as a result of bad operation with other file system filters. Ensure that no antivirus or backup software is running on the mount directory.
MessageTable.xC1420106: An extract request was received for a file that has already been extracted. This request will not be honored.
MessageTable.xC1420107: The service was notified of two different files with the same file id. These files had incompatable flags set. The mount operation will be aborted.
MessageTable.xC1420108: The file system container attempted to insert a file name twice. This is invalid, the wim service should only receive one notification per file name.
MessageTable.xC1420109: The service received a bad message from the filter. This message will not be processed.
MessageTable.xC142010A: The service received an extract for a file that is not in a mounted image. This extract will be ignored.
MessageTable.xC142010B: An attempt was made to unmount a directory that is not mounted.
MessageTable.xC142010C: An attempt was made to commit an image that was mounted for read only access. This is not valid. To commit an image, mount it without the read only flag set.
MessageTable.xC142010E: A nonexistant mount directory was given to the extraction process. The extraction process requires that the image be stubbed before it starts.
MessageTable.xC142010F: An invalid handle was passed to the image manager. This is a programming error.
MessageTable.xC1420110: The specified image handle was not used to mount an image, and cannot be used to unmount. Please call WIMUnmountImage with the name of the mount directory to unmount your image.
MessageTable.xC1420111: An image matching the specified mount data could not be found.
MessageTable.xC1420112: The image cannot be unmounted because a file in the mount directory is still in use.
MessageTable.xC1420113: The user attempted to mount to a directory that already contained a mounted image. This is not supported.
MessageTable.xC1420114: The user attempted to mount to a directory that is not empty. This is not supported.
MessageTable.xC1420115: The user attempted to mount to a directory that does not exist. This is not supported.
MessageTable.xC1420116: A bad image handle was passed to WIMUnmountImageHandle. Only the image handle passed to WIMMountImageHandle or an image handle retrieved from WIMGetMountedImageHandle may be used in WIMUnmountImageHandle.
MessageTable.xC1420117: The directory could not be completely unmounted. This is usually due to applications that still have files opened within the mount directory. Close these files and unmount again to complete the unmount process.
MessageTable.xC1420118: The mounted image is already in use. Please ensure that it was not mounted by another process.
MessageTable.xC1420119: The wimserv.exe binary could not be found. Please ensure that it is available in the system search path.
MessageTable.xC142011A: Imagex timed out while waiting for the wimmount extractor process to initialize.
MessageTable.xC142011B: The wimmount service shutdown without returning a status.
MessageTable.xC142011C: The specified directory is not a valid mounted directory.
MessageTable.xC142011D: The specified mounted image cannot be committed back into the WIM. This occurs when an image has been through a partial unmount or when an image is still being mounted. If this image was unmounted with commit earlier, then the commit probably succeeded. Please validate that this is the case and then unmount without commit.
MessageTable.xC142011E: The mount directory of the specified image has changed. All the files in this image will be extracted, and this image cannot be commited.
MessageTable.xC142011F: The volume of the specified mount path does not support reparse points. Please mount to a volume that supports reparse points.
MessageTable.xC1420120: The specified directory contains a corrupted mount image. No mount operations can be performed on this directory.
MessageTable.xC1420121: The image could not be mounted because the wimmount.sys driver is not installed on this machine. To fix this error, install the wimmount.sys driver.
MessageTable.xC1420122: The mounted image could not be committed because the image in the wim was modified after it was mounted.
MessageTable.xC1420123: The specified directory could not be remounted because it is not a valid remount target. The most likely reason that it is not valid is that the directory has already been unmounted.
MessageTable.xC1420124: The specified directory could not be remounted because the image in the wim was modified after it was mounted.
MessageTable.xC1420125: The specified directory could not be remounted because an unmount of that directory is in progress.
MessageTable.xC1420126: The specified image is already mounted, and cannot be mounted again.
MessageTable.xC1420127: The specified image in the specified wim is already mounted for read/write access.
MessageTable.xC1420128: The specified image handle was not opened with the correct access level. In order to mount an image handle, the handle must have WIM_GENERIC_MOUNT access.
MessageTable.xC1420130: The user attempted to mount a split wim. This is unsupported.
MessageTable.xC1420131: The user attempted to mount to the root of a volume. This is unsupported.
MessageTable.xC1420132: The version of wimgapi used to create this mount directory does not match the current version. Ensure that wimserv.exe, wimmount.sys and imagex.exe/wimgapi.dll are of matching version.
MessageTable.xC1420134: The drive of the specified mount path is not supported. Please mount to a volume on a fixed drive.
MessageTable.xC1420135: The mount operation failed. When mounting, you must disable any software (for example, antivirus or search indexer) that accesses files under that specified mount path.
MessageTable.xC143010D: An invalid image index was specified to the wim container wrapper. The wrapper cannot open an image.
MessageTable.xC1440129: The specified log file exists and is not a unicode encoded text file. Only unicode encoded text files are supported.
MessageTable.xC144012F: [ WARN ] The extended attribute on file %1 was ignored.
MessageTable.xC1440136: Unsupported operation. Check that the OS you are running contains a wof driver (wof.sys/wofadk.sys).
MessageTable.xC1440137: Unsupported operation. Check that the WIMBoot applied image is WIMBoot compatible.
MessageTable.xC1440138: Unsupported operation. Check that the WIMBoot applied image is being saved locally and not to a network share.
MessageTable.xC1440139: Unsupported operation. Check that existing OS images contained in the specified WIM file are in WIMBoot supported format.
MessageTable.xC144013A: Unsupported operation. Check that the OS image at the specified path to be captured is WIMBoot supported.
MessageTable.xC144013B: Unsupported operation. Check that the OS you are running contains a wof driver (wof.sys).

Data.UserAgreement:
Hot Tip
Chuyu team warn you read this user agreement (hereinafter referred to as 'agreement') carefully before you use Dism++.Please read me prudently then choose to accept or not.If you want to use Dism++,you must accept agreement.If you use Dism++,we deem you accepted agreement and you not mind the clauses.
Agreement arranged the rights and obligations of software service (hereinafter referred to as 'service')of Chuyu team and the users.'Users' means register and login and use this service personally.
One: Dism++ Permission
1. We allows the personal users use Dism++ in the personal computer only.The users can't use Dism++ in a non-personal environment,only if you saw the written approval from Chuyu team.
2. You must read Dism++ help document carefully before you use Dism++.
3. Dism++ users have the accountability to feedback the program bugs and the suggestions.If you use Dism++ for 30 days,you should send mingkuang a not-less-than-345-word Dism++ usage report.If you use Dism++ for 8 mounths or more,you should send mingkuang a not-less-than-520-word Annual Dism++ improvement suggestions on November 11th(local time).The email of mingkuang:mingkuang@live.com
4. Dism++ users must love of peace and unity and friendship and helpful.
5. Everyone cannot unauthorized use(including but not limited to copy or disseminate or show or mirror or upload or download in an illegal way)or impact Chuyu team normal serve by an unconventional way(For example,malicious disturb Chuyu team informations)If someone get Chuyu team informations from the Chuyu softwares,we will investigate for legal responsibility according to law.
6. Chuyu team can ban the not-comply-with-the-permit users to use all the Chuyu softwares.We won't accept your demand or give technical support to you then investigate for legal responsibility according to law.
7. Chuyu team will try our best to solve the comply-with-the-permit users' problems(provide necessary help and support)The time is because of the complexity and the users' votes.
Two: Protect The Users' Privacy 1. When Dism++ run,Dism++ gleans the messages of your system(including but not limited to the system version and architecture and name and language and CPU type and RAM)and Dism++ abnormal running information. But it don't glean the users' identity information.
2. Perhaps Chuyu team will send the users the messages of invite or fix program bug or invite to vote.
Three: Bear The Risks 1. Chuyu team have an open-type attitude so everyone can let Dism++ better.Some functions may lead unknown aftermath so Chuyu team will remove the possible risk and tell the users.But we didn't solve all the issue.You must bear all the aftermath yourself.Please tell Chuyu team after you find some problems to prevent others have the problems.
2. Please understand and agree because our softwares need to develop.Chuyu team persists the rights to change or pause or end or revoke all or some service.The users need to bear this danger.
Four: Intellectual Property Rights Statement 1. Chuyu team has all the intellectual property rights of this-service content(including but not limited to program , webpage , text and so on)
2. If no important clauses,Chuyu team has all the intellectual property rights.
3. If Chuyu team didn't consent in writing,the users cannot process Chuyu softwares anyway.Cannot tell others have the rights to proces Chuyu softwares.
4. Above and other intellectual property rights of Chuyu team are protected by law.If Chuyu team didn't allow you,you cannot disassemble or do others.
Five: Legal Responsibility 1. If Chuyu team see someone report some users breached this agreement,Chuyu team have the rights to ban the users to use Chuyu softwares without informing.
2. Please understand and agree.Chuyu team have the rights to reasonably penalize the violation behavior with law.
3. Please understand and agree.If the users breach this agreement lead third party arise the claim(including the reasonable money to lawyer).The users must compensate for Chuyu team.
Six: Others 1. Chuyu team solemnly tell the users notice the clauses of exempt the responsibility of Chuyu team and the rights of limit the users.Minors should read this agreement with the legal guardians.
2. The agreement validity and explanation apply in Chinese law.If the users and Chuyu team have disputes,negotiated settlement first.If it's failed,please agree to report the having-jurisdiction people's court to administer.
3. If the agreement clauses be invalid or not executable because of whatever reason,the other clauses are still valid.Binding upon Both.
4. If other-language version and simplified-chinese are different,please look at the simplified-chinese version.
